name: The Adventure of White Boy
description:
You play a little white doll that has to master its adventure through a total of 5 small levels without dying even once! Collect the coins scattered throughout the level to have an extra challenge!

This game was programmed within 5 days for the "My First Game Jam: Summer 2022" Game Jam! It's the second game I've ever programmed and developed, so it didn't turn out very big or good. I still hope you enjoyed this little game and I would appreciate any feedback (negative or positive).
